definition: hemaglutinin (the H of virus such as bird flu H5N1)

sentences.english: Dislodgement of clot can lead to embolic phenomena, including stroke.
sentences.chinese: 血凝塊移除可導致栓賽現象，包括腦中風。

sentences.english: The method of reverse phase hemagglutination test for serum Helicobacter pylori antigen(HP-RPHA)was founded.
sentences.chinese: 建立反相間接血凝法檢測幽門螺桿菌抗原的方法。

sentences.english: There may be a history of frequent blood clots .
sentences.chinese: 有可能是一個歷史上頻繁的血凝塊。

sentences.english: Mrs. Clinton suffered a blood clot in her leg in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 1998年克林頓夫人的腿部就出現過血凝塊。

sentences.english: A tendency to form blood clots, he added, can be something we're born with.
sentences.chinese: 據他所說，形成血凝塊的傾向也許是我們天生俱有的。

sentences.english: Most common blood clots occur in the leg.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的血凝塊發生在腿部。

sentences.english: Iodophor sterilization does not influence the accuracy of INR detected with CoaguChek XS.
sentences.chinese: 碘伏皮膚消毒不會影響快速血凝儀測量結果的準確性。

sentences.english: Gastrodia elate Blume medicinal wine has extensive applied prospect.
sentences.chinese: 天麻藥酒具有顯著的抗血凝作用。

sentences.english: This indicated that hypercoagulable rat model had been successfully established by feeding rats with high starch diet.
sentences.chinese: 這表明用高澱粉膳食成功建立了高血凝大鼠動物模型。

sentences.english: The receptor for hemagglutinin may be a carbohydrate.
Hemagglutinin inhibition test was performed to detect titer of antiserum.
sentences.chinese: 通過血凝抑制實驗檢測抗血清的抗體滴度。

sentences.english: The researchers injected the lectins into eighteen day old embryos .
sentences.chinese: 研究員將這個血凝素注射到有十八天的晶胚裏。

sentences.english: Hemagglutination of some viruses has a particular PH requirement .
sentences.chinese: 某些病毒的血凝反應需要一定的PH值。

sentences.english: Therefore, it was inferred that the hemagglutinin might be a glycoprotein on the virus capsid.
sentences.chinese: 由此推斷，血凝素可能是病毒衣殼上的一種糖蛋白。

sentences.english: Epidemiologic studies showed that hyperlipidemia was closely correlation with hypercoagulability.
sentences.chinese: 流行病學研究表明，高血脂和高血凝密切相關。

sentences.english: Note the dark red blood clot forming the hemopericardium . The hemopericardium can lead to tamponade.
sentences.chinese: 注意暗紅血凝塊爲心包積血，可致心包填塞。

definition: clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis
hematoma (internal blood clot)/extravasated blood (spilt into surrounding tissue)/contusion
(in Chinese medicine) stasis (of blood or other fluids)
hemolysis (breakdown of red blood cells leading to anemia)
silted up/obstructed by silt/variant of 瘀滯|瘀滞[yu1 zhi4]
